g:HTMLPanel.p: The Internationalization and Accessibility chpater shows several approaches to increasing the uptake of your application. This demo shows all those in action
We hope that you learn as much from this Demo application as you do from each of the examples.
Static I18N - This shows the static i18n in action.
Dynamic I18N - This shows dynamic i18n in ation.
Direction - Shows the use of GWT Direction and Locale by automatically re-ordering a panel depending on whether locael is LTR or RTL.
